scripts.say: What have I told you, Takao? Even the Royal Navy's heavy armor is so fragile from Air Corps bombardment. I feel so helpless for them...
I hate to admit it though... they really did a good job. Indeed, I underestimated the strength of our Air Corps.
No worries. They got the credit, for now. But as long as the high ranks still care about the "final battle", our ranks are untouchable.
Right. Then let us wait for our chance to come.
With help from our Air Corps, the Z-Fleet was destroyed... It looks like the world is going to tremble——
Let me witness….the dawn of a new era...
